original_text: The glory of Lebanon shall come unto thee, the fir tree, the pine tree, and the box together, to beautify the place of my sanctuary; and I will make the place of my feet glorious.
korean_text: 레바논의 영광 곧 잣나무와 소나무와 황양목이 함께 네게 이르러 내 거룩한 곳을 아름답게 할 것이며 내가 나의 발 둘 곳을 영화롭게 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: The glory of Lebanon shall come unto thee
the fir tree, the pine tree, and the box together
to beautify the place of my sanctuary
and I will make the place of my feet glorious
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 발의 처소를 영광스럽게 만들리라
